Keywords: Avengers , Codex , Reporter , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
SECRET IDENTITY: SPIDER-MAN: When Peter Parker would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game, when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points and an additional 25 points.

September 9, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
@Puuka, The Spider-Man/Venom/Carnage set had 2 different spider-man pieces that this guy could transform in to. It isn't reflected in the dial view on this site, but both the common and SR spidey dials from this set have a second dial on click 9 for him to transform into, smiilar to the old-school secret identity mechanic
September 9, 2021
Puuka
His SECRET IDENTITY power isn't that useful. There's only 3 figures it could be used with they are all Mutant Mayhem and earlier. The only other that comes up in the HCR Units filter is from CAAV from early 2020. and it might not apply as it has a split dial (caav052)
October 3, 2020
mc268
Peter is really good, low cost, great support powers and good stats. His secret identity options are both good depending on what you’re going for. Honestly, I keep mine on click two though since I only use him as the replacement for the SR. He’s really good though. Whether he’s using prob, outwit or defend, he makes some contributions. The three range, autonomous and incap is really solid too. In my last game, after the SR died, he came in, and two turns later KO’d the JJJ token the SR had spawned.
September 18, 2020
FlashSpidey
I love him. Cheap prob with the ability to add a good Spidey dial. Plus Codex keyword makes me happy and really helps.
